name: NyanfuGirl
description:
☆Nyanfu Girl☆

■Genre: Side-Scrolling Erotic Action Video Game

■Total 30 Stages! + 5 Boss Stages

■There are a total of 49 kinds of sexy graphics.
　　9 types of standard images, 35 variations, 4 types of mini animations

■Go to the following sections on the title screen to see the graphics.
・GALLERY：A
・GALLERY：B

■Nyanfu Girl story
Chunpai, a Nyanfu fighter, often fights off
the evil gang called "The Jong Family".
But one day, she was kidnapped and had embarrassing photos taken of her!
They even spread the photos around the internet as revenge porn.
It absolutely ruined her life.
There was a service to remove the images off the internet completely
if you pay with the digital money called "Pitcoin".
Chunpai made a plan. To get all her revenge porn data back,
she decided to annihilate the Jong Family and take all of their Pitcoins.
